title: Giddy
report: Drank it all.  I still taste it now after 2.5 hours.  It tasted pretty bad but I brushed my teeth and it gets better.  I've done everything out there and this is fun.  It made me feel giddy and happy and I'm glad I did it.

erowid.citation: Jbo. "Giddy: experience with Wormwood (Oil) (ID 79641)". Erowid.org. Jun 28, 2009. erowid.org/exp/79641
